seasons of service with the Eagles. Tagging Michael Vick . If the Eagles hope to use the franchise tag on Michael Vick , it should be available to them even amid the NFL's labor unrest. I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash , the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday.
